document_data.name: Sikayah bint Hava
document_data.mainbody: Princess '''Sikayah''' was the eldest daughter of Caliph [[Hava al-Gatil]] of [[Halwa]] in the [[Cities of the Heart]] region of [[interior Zakhara]].
document_data.Relationships:
Sikayah was the eldest of triplets. Her sisters were [[Rajiyah bint Hava|Rajiyah]], and [[Mahabbiyah bint Hava|Mahabbiyah]]. They were nearing maturity as of {{Yearlink|1367}}.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Adventurer's Guide to Zakhara|58}}

The Caliph's Grand Vizier, [[Zarad]], wished to marry her to bolster a future claim on the throne.
